resources.string: We are a team of tech enthusiasts who are striving to bring creative learning and precious experiences within your reach.\n\nOur efforts are solely for expanding knowledge and setting up projects for students who wish to explore various fields and nurture their mind, or as we like to keep it, Engi-start ones’ mind.

Because we believe that, only in your benefit lies our success.

Borrow micro-controllers from library just as you borrow books

Borrow it , Use it , Learn it , Return it

You can reserve/issue any component (micro-controllers) any number of time from the library portal.

We provide you the micro-controllers anytime you need, you need to just register yourself and fill a offline registration form.

Moreover, we are providing you with a free Workshop on public demand.

Since we are a start-up collaborated with K. J. Somaiya library, we will be providing our services for six months.
Do you want to be your college’s ambassador?\n If yes then mail your CV at engistat@gmail.com
